author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
We continue our coverage of Valve's latest hardware announcements with a hands-on look at the new Steam Controller and Steam Machine! Let's run through the specs and design of both devices before hearing directly from Valve engineers about how these work together as well as with the Steam Frame. 

Hands-On with Steam Frame VR Headset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7q2CS8HDHU

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Hands-On: Valve Steam Controller 2 and Steam Machine!
